# Gyrocompass System Spare Parts
## Public Works and Government Services Canada
### Solicitation Number: F6835-220359/A

### Contracting Entity
- Name: Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada (Public Works and Government Services Canada)
- Address:
  11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage
  Gatineau, Québec
  K1A 0S5
- Contact Information:
  Grant, Jonathan
  jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  (709) 689-9978

### Trade Agreement Requirements
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Requirements
- The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires gyroscope system spare parts for maintenance of existing systems.
- The parts must be specific Sperry Marine Northrop Grumman components.
- Delivery is required by January 31, 2023.
- Bidders must demonstrate compliance with the Statement of Work document.

### Delivery Address
- Department of Fisheries and Oceans
- 280 Southside Road
- St. John’s, NL A1C 5X1
- Attention: Todd Porter

### Tender Closing Date
- The bid submission deadline is September 22, 2022, 12:30:52 PM.

### Attachment
- The solicitation document, which includes the Statement of Work, can be downloaded from [Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/05deb67a4b522dca8bcf84284bea2de0/ABES.PROD.PW_OLZ.B011.F7855.EBSU000.PDF).

### Standard Terms and Conditions
- The clauses and conditions uniformized of this market are incorporated by reference into, and form part of, the bid and contract documents. You can view them at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/politiques-et-lignes-directrices/guide-des-cl
